name: The Case of The Missing Butler
name_original: The Case of The Missing Butler
description:
This is a game made for the Adventure Game Challenge game jam 2020.
Most of the art was done by my wife Artemis. Additional crappy art was done by me. You will know which ones I did when playing the game. ;)

Uses sound from Kenny Assets. Rain FX from http://www.orangefreesounds.com/.
Font RobotSlab from Google Fonts.
